description: Allows the mob to randomly look around.
title: Random Look Around

look_time.title: Look Time
look_time.description: The range of time in seconds the mob will stay looking in a random direction before looking elsewhere

max_angle_of_view_horizontal.title: Max Angle Of View Horizontal
max_angle_of_view_horizontal.description: The rightmost angle a mob can look at on the horizontal plane with respect to its initial facing direction.

min_angle_of_view_horizontal.title: Min Angle Of View Horizontal
min_angle_of_view_horizontal.description: The leftmost angle a mob can look at on the horizontal plane with respect to its initial facing direction.
